item.title: Google Cloud Platform での OpenID Connect の構成 - GitHub Docs
item.description: OpenID Connect (OIDC) allows your GitHub Actions workflows to access resources in Google Cloud Platform (GCP), without needing to store the GCP credentials as long-lived GitHub secrets.
